Package uy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldInterface  
    PileAndDrawPileInterface
    Groups the classes, namely DrawPile and Pile classes by the characteristics common to both of them This interface was not used to correspond to an object (e.g.
    SuitPileAndPileInterface
    implements the characteristics common to both suit piled and draw pile The grouped_piles object in SolitaireDemo class that implements this interface This interface was not used to be instantiated as an object but I think still doing this , is useful when debugging errors common to the suit pile and draw pile
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Implements the characteristics of a card
    CardField
    Implements the image of a card in the GUI
    DrawPile
    Implements the characteristics of the draw pile
    DrawPileAndSuitPilesField
    Implements the characteristics common to both the draw pile and suit piles
    DrawPileHolderPanel  
    FileChooserDemo
    having the same name, the original code of this class is found in https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/examples/components/index.html#FileChooserDemo
    LayeredPaneLayout  
    LinkedStack
    Implements the characteristics common to all stacks Note: In this program, the words "Stack" and "Pile" are used interchangeably
    MainDrawPilePanel
    Implements the characteristics of the main draw pile
    ManualReader  
    MenuPanels  
    MouseAdaptForCard
    Implements the adapter needed for a card to move
    MouseAdaptForCardInMainDrawPile  
    Node  
    Pile
    implements the characteristics of the draw pile
    PilePanel  
    PilesField  
    PilesPanelHolder  
    SaveOrLoadStream  
    SolitaireDemo
    This is the entry program of this Solitaire Game
    SolitaireGameCards
    Contains the cards needed to be used and displayed on the actual proogram as well as the state of the game (victory or withdraw);
    SolitaireGUI  
    SubDrawPile
    Implements the characteristics of a sub_draw_pile which is the pile where the card immediately taken from the draw pile goes to
    SubDrawPilePanel
    Implements the characteristics of the sub_draw_pile's panel which represent the object associated with the GUI
    SuitPile
    implements the characteristics specific to a suit pile
    SuitPilePanel  
    SuitPilesAndPilesField  
    SuitPilesField
    Implements the characteristics of the field area where the whole suit piles field is which represents the object associated with the GUI
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidPushException
    Handles the occurence of an invalid move due to a wrong push of card/s from one pile into another The kind of pile that implements this exception consists of DrawPile, Pile and SuitPile classes
    StackUnderFlowException
    Handles the occurence of popping a card from an empty pile
